edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster

Class CentroidClusteringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.berkeley.compbio.ml.cluster.CentroidClusteringUtils

  • public final class CentroidClusteringUtils
extends Object
    Represents a clustering algorithm. In general an algorithm will group Clusterable samples into Clusters; this interface is agnostic about whether the implementation is supervised or unsupervised, and whether it is online or batch.
    Version:
    $Id: CentroidClusteringMethod.java 393 2009-05-08 00:49:01Z soergel $
    Author:
    David Soergel

    • Method Detail

      • computeClusterStdDevs

        public static <T extends Clusterable<T>> void computeClusterStdDevs(Collection<? extends CentroidCluster<T>> theClusters,
                                                    com.davidsoergel.stats.DissimilarityMeasure<T> measure,
                                                    Map<String,? extends CentroidCluster<T>> assignments,
                                                    ClusterableIterator<T> theDataPointProvider)
        for each cluster, compute the standard deviation of the distance of each point to the centroid. This does not reassign points or move the centroids. Logically it would be nice for this to be a method of Cluster, but we can't do that since the Cluster may not keep track of the samples it contains.
        Parameters:
        theDataPointProvider -

      • shortClusteringStats

        public static <T extends Clusterable<T>> String shortClusteringStats(Collection<? extends CentroidCluster<T>> theClusters,
                                                     com.davidsoergel.stats.DissimilarityMeasure<T> measure)

      • writeClusteringStatsToStream

        public static <T extends Clusterable<T>> void writeClusteringStatsToStream(Collection<? extends CentroidCluster<T>> theClusters,
                                                           com.davidsoergel.stats.DissimilarityMeasure<T> measure,
                                                           OutputStream outf)
        Writes a long String describing statistics about the clustering, such as the complete cluster distance matrix, to the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        outf - an OutputStream to which to write the string as it's built
